meanings.definition: A substance or tool used to remove tangles from hair.
meanings.sent1: I used the detangler to untangle my hair after swimming.
meanings.sent2: She always carries a detangler in her bag to keep her hair smooth.
meanings.sent3: The detangler worked like magic, making my hair silky and knot-free.
meanings.sent4: Her detangler was like a superhero, rescuing her hair from knots and snarls.
meanings.sent5: The detangler's effect was so impressive that I couldn't stop touching my soft hair.

meanings.definition: A product designed to make it easier to comb or brush hair by reducing tangles.
meanings.sent1: Mom bought a detangler spray to help with my tangled hair.
meanings.sent2: The detangler made brushing my hair a breeze every morning.
meanings.sent3: I sprayed the detangler on my hair and pretended to have a magic potion.
meanings.sent4: Using the detangler felt like waving a wand to banish hair tangles.
meanings.sent5: The detangler transformed my morning routine into a smooth and hassle-free experience.
